full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference Information

* Title: **W0133-24T070 - Custom Molded Hearing Protection**
* Reference Number: **WS4348960858-Doc4441385969**
* Solicitation Number: **WS4348960858**
* Publication Date: **February 13, 2024**

#### Tender Overview

* Solicitation Type: **Request for Proposal (RFP)**
* Tender Status: **Expired**
* Method of Procurement: **Competitive - Open Bidding**

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence is seeking offers for the provision of custom molded hearing protection devices. These devices must be comfortable to wear and feature a frequency-tuned filter to enhance communication while blocking noise levels.

#### Technical Specifications

The hearing protection devices must comply with the following specifications:

* UNSPSC Code: **46181900** (Hearing Protectors)
* Specification Description:  *Hearing Protectors*

#### Government of Canada Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

#### Regions of Opportunity

* Region of Delivery: **British Columbia**

#### Contact Information

For inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

* Oscar Slabicki, Procurement Specialist
* Phone: Not provided
* Email: [oscar.slabicki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.slabicki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18775420](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18775420)

#### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is **March 1, 2024**, at **14:00:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time)**.

#### Expected Contract Dates

* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: **May 30, 2024**

Note the dates and times are in **Eastern Standard Time (EST)**. The Canadian government's standard business hours is 08:30 am to 04:30 pm (EST), Monday to Friday. The Toronto Customs Brokerage at TD Logistics would recommend to expedite all shipments to the Canadian government to ensure speedier delivery and compliance with customs regulations.

Exclusive of the text above, here is a politelly worded notification that the company has to follow:
> "Relevant shipment details and compliance with customs regulations should
